description: A React functional component called PathCard that renders a summary card view of a learning path, displaying an image or placeholder, title, description, course count, progress percentage, and a CTA button linking to the path detail page.

methods.name: PathCard({ path, ctaLabel = "View Path" })
methods.description: A React functional component that renders a learning path summary card with optional thumbnail, title, description, course count, progress percentage, and a link button.

ctags.name: PathCard
ctags.pattern: /^export default function PathCard({ path, ctaLabel = "View Path" }) {$/
